title: 11A.02 DEFINITIONS.
text:
For the purposes of sections 11A.01 to 11A.25, the terms defined in this section shall have the meanings given them.
"State board" means the Minnesota State Board of Investment created by article XI, section 8 of the Constitution of the state of Minnesota for the purpose of administering and directing the investment of all state funds and pension funds.
"Council" means the Investment Advisory Council created by section 11A.08.
"Fund" means any of the individual funds, including but not limited to the permanent school fund, general fund of the state, retirement funds and other funds and accounts for which the state board has responsibilities.
"Director" means the executive director of the state board.
"Management" means the performance or delegation of general management duties relating to any fund established pursuant to this chapter.
